results.title: Calcium Channel Blocker Overdose Causes Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome and Acute Kidney Injury in a 15-Year-Old Female
results.text_hl: This case identifies a 15-year-old Hispanic female who developed @DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@acute respiratory distress syndrome@@@ (@DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@ARDS@@@) and @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute kidney injury@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@AKI@@@) after an @DISEASE_Drug_Overdose @DISEASE_MESH:D062787 @@@overdose@@@ of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Welsh LH, Bose JT, Sahhar HS. Calcium Channel Blocker Overdose Causes Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome and Acute Kidney Injury in a 15-Year-Old Female Cureus. 2023 Aug;15(8):e43806. PMID: 37731443

results.title: Amlodipine alleviates renal ischemia/reperfusion injury in rats through Nrf2/Sestrin2/PGC-1alpha/TFAM Pathway
results.text_hl: Previously, observational studies showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ can mitigate calcineurin inhibitor- and contrast-induced @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute kidney injury@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@AKI@@@).

results.title: Rhabdomyolysis induced acute renal failure secondary to statins
results.text_hl: We report a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic kidney disease@@@ who had @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@deterioration of renal function@@@ due to combination of risk factors like @DISEASE_Hypothyroidism @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroidism@@@ and interaction of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Clopidogrel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077144 @@@clopidogrel@@@ with statins.
